message:
Think twice before you reply to this:
Why would you use "DevExpress" or similar reporting plugins while you may spent more hours developing your own reports using HTML and CSS and win the performance battle?

data.message:
Why would you buy anything if you can build it "better" yourself? 
This is the engineering mind playing a classic trick on you, that I could have built this better over the weekend, or whatever similar self promoting promises that you will never be able to achieve, not because you lack skill but because that's not what you were set up to do in the first place, it doesn't make any financial sense to build everything yourself, you focus on your core problem and spend all the time and effort on it, and use any financial resources available to solve any other related needs or problems.
From my personal experience DevExpress sucks. That's why I wouldn't use it
Do you want to allow end users to create their own reports? It's easier for programmers to create the report in code, but harder to create a report designer
